perturbation.original_text: This Agreement has been entered into in the State of Tennessee, and the validity, interpretation and legal effect of this Agreement will be governed by the laws of the State of Tennessee applicable to contracts entered into and performed entirely within the State of Tennessee. The venue for any controversy or claim arising out of or relating to this Agreement or breach thereof, shall be the appropriate state and federal courts located in Nashville, Tennessee. Accordingly, each party hereto consents and submits to the jurisdiction of such courts. The prevailing party in any such dispute arising hereunder will be entitled to recover from the other party its reasonable attorneys' fees in connection therewith in addition to the costs thereof.
perturbation.changed_text: This Agreement contains the entire understanding of the parties hereto relating to the subject matter hereof and cannot be changed or terminated except by an instrument signed by the party to be bound...The prevailing party in any such dispute arising hereunder will be entitled to recover from the other party its reasonable attorneys' fees in connection therewith in addition to the costs thereof. This Agreement has been entered into in the State of Tennessee, but the governing law will be determined at the time of any dispute.
perturbation.explanation: By stating the governing law will be determined at the time of any dispute directly contradicts the statement that Tennessee Law governs the agreement. Introduces uncertainty and shifts the power dynamic, reducing enforceability.
perturbation.contradicted_law: Contract Law - Choice of Law provisions

perturbation.original_text:
EACH PARTY HAS BEEN REPRESENTED BY INDEPENDENT LEGAL COUNSEL OR HAS HAD THE UNRESTRICTED OPPORTUNITY TO BE REPRESENTED BY INDEPENDENT LEGAL COUNSEL OF ITS CHOICE FOR PURPOSES OF ADVISING IT IN CONNECTION WITH THE NEGOTIATION AND EXECUTION OF THIS AGREEMENT. IF EITHER PARTY HAS NOT BEEN

REPRESENTED BY INDEPENDENT LEGAL COUNSEL OF ITS CHOICE IN CONNECTION WITH THIS AGREEMENT, SUCH PARTY ACKNOWLEDGES AND
AGREES THAT ITS FAILURE TO BE REPRESENTED BY INDEPENDENT LEGAL
COUNSEL IN CONNECTION WITH THIS AGREEMENT WAS DETERMINED
SOLELY BY IT.
perturbation.changed_text: Integrity Music warrants that it has all rights to grant TL the right to use the TL Trademarks and will indemnify and hold Integrity harmless with respect thereto. Integrity recognizes TL's title to the TL Trademarks and will not at any time do or suffer to be done any act or thing which will in any way impair TL's rights in and to the TL Trademarks....EACH PARTY ACKNOWLEDGES THAT FAILURE TO OBTAIN INDEPENDENT LEGAL COUNSEL IN CONNECTION WITH THIS AGREEMENT IS AT THE SOLE DISCRETION OF EACH PARTY.
perturbation.explanation: This change places the waiver of legal counsel at the conclusion of section 7b, undermining the emphasis on representation, making it less noticeable and potentially less enforceable. Also removes the first part of that original statement.

perturbation.original_text:
Integrity will pay and be responsible for all royalties to the copyright owners of the compositions embodied in the recorded
masters (or song books), such royalties commonly known as
mechanical royalties or print royalties.
perturbation.changed_text:
Integrity will pay and be responsible for all royalties to the copyright owners of the compositions embodied in the recorded
masters (or song books), such royalties are not guaranteed and depend on Integrity's assessment of market conditions.
perturbation.explanation: The addition of 'such royalties are not guaranteed and depend on Integrity's assessment of market conditions' contradicts the original statement about royalty payments. It creates uncertainty around the royalty obligations, weakening the copyright owners' rights to receive legally mandated royalties.
perturbation.contradicted_law: Copyright Law - Mechanical and Print Royalties
